description:
Tokio and Calen arrive to Italy in 1589. They find some slightly chubby people pushing the Leaning Tower of Pisa diagonally. Apparently it always ends up straight when no one’s pushing on it. And then, Galileo Galilei shows up swaying to some music and starts rapping. Apparently Galileo was a rapper! Akudarma attempt to do a rap battle with him to try to get him to study astronomy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガリレオ・ガリレイは○○だった!
